You watched the battle progressing on the massive screen in front of you. Well, that was a lie. There was no battle. That implied they were fighting back. They certainly weren't. And it was a truly beautiful site.

You were in your fortress, a massive flying cube-shaped ship, almost casually floating in the sky over what was formerly Cerulean City. Two things were happening. First, the ship itself was launching attack after attack down on the structures, fire blasts and electric assaults seen from only the most powerful pokemon in the world. Buildings were being burned to the ground or knocked over into rubble. The local police station had already been destroyed, and the few remaining members of the local law enforcement team were already running in a mad panic. On the ground, a team of pokemon assembled in the very bowels of hell itself were running rampant through the streets, brutally murdering every single human or pokemon encountered. Machamps, Alakazams, Rhydons, and assorted other pokemon of extreme power were taking no prisoners. All according to your plan.

By the time national defenses showed up, there would be nothing left of the town and every single person who had previously resided in there would be dead. And it would have taken only half an hour. An entire major city reduced to rubble. That would be more than enough to at least get them to take you seriously. They might try to fight back, at least a little bit, see what you really had. But nothing they could do would put so much as a dent in you. You knew this. You had been planning this for years. Before long, the entire world would have no choice but to give in to your demands, lofty though they may be. You would rule the world, just like the kings and emperors of the old days.

The door across the room slid open, revealing a tall beautiful blonde, wearing a red swimsuit that was still slightly damp. She dashed in, big bare feet slapping against the hard floor, making her way over to your throne in the middle of the chamber.

"Just in time," you remarked dryly as she ran over, arms pumping at her sides as she closed the distance between her and you. When she was about ten feet away, you lazily raised your left hand at her, and in the next instance she collided full-on into what seemed to be an invisible wall. She fell backwards onto her back, groaning slightly and shaking her head. "I don't recall giving you permission to approach me."

"STOP!" She yelled, scrambling into a standing position. "What are you doing?! Just...stop!" She looked at you defiantly, scowling.

"Ah, so you saw my handiwork on the screens outside?" You smirked. "Beautiful, isn't it?"

"No! It's horrible! You have to stop now!" She insisted, looking up at the massive screen you were still staring at. "Please, you've done too much already, just...stop!"

"Sometimes, for true greatness to occur, sacrifices must be made. And your hometown, I'm afraid, is the sacrificial lamb."

Daisy's mouth fell open, looking up at the giant screen in confusion. "W-what are you trying to do?! I-"

"You world needs leadership. A single voice to lead everyone else. There's so much confusion in the world, we need things to be simpler. Me, a man of my powers and abilities, I'm that single voice. Unfortunately, sometimes you have to take such a mantle by force," you answered. "So, I'm going to show your world exactly what I can do. And when I'm done, they'll give me everything I want. This is just me making a powerful statement."

She tried to run at you again, but you simply raised your hand at her again and she found herself frozen on the spot, unable to move a muscle. With a flick of your wrist she was thrown back to the floor.

"Please...sir, I don't know who you are, or...what happened to you to...I don't know. But please, think about what you're doing. You're killing thousands of people and destroying millions in property." She slowly got back up to her feet, looking at you now imploringly. "Please. I'm begging you, reconsider."

"It's too late." You pointed up at the screen. "In less than five minutes there won't be anything left of Cerulean. It will be a memory. In fact, of the thousands who were in the city when I launched my attack, only three will remain alive." With that, you turned to look at Daisy.

"S-...sir. Please. I'll do anything, just stop." She clasped her hands together in front of her, looking at you with big, pleading eyes. "Sir, I'm begging you. I'll do anything."

"You're my prisoner. You'll be following my orders no matter what. Now, I've chosen to take you and your two sisters alive. The Waterflower heirs will no doubt make valuable hostages in the event that my show outside isn't enough to convince the world leaders of how serious I am." You paused dramatically. "But that's not the only reason I kept you alive."

Daisy looked down at the ground, shivering slightly, starting to choke out little sobs.

"DON'T!" You said harshly, which shocked her right out of her crying. "Do not cry, I'm talking to you, pay attention." You cleared your throat. "I am a man mostly unfettered by the vices and obsessions of other humans, but one thing has always sucked me in." She stood there, still shaking, but listening. "The Sensational Sisters of Cerulean City. Beautiful and talented. I confess, somewhat shamefully, I've always been rather obsessed with you three. But you, Daisy, in particular. Your beauty is unmatched in all the world."

Her mouth fell slightly open and she looked down at the floor.

"When I decided I needed to forcefully take over the world, I knew I had to have you three at my disposal."

"D...disposal..." her eyes flew open and she unconsciously took a step back. "You...you wouldn't-"

"Oh! My sweet, I suppose I can understand you having a low opinion of me at the moment, but...but trust me, that is beneath me." You snickered. "No, nothing so debauched, trust me."

"I...I don't understand." She looked down at her feet, voice meek and trembling.

"Well, I don't want to say never, but...no, I have something else in mind. I've always been fond of one particular act, arguably sexual in nature, but certainly nothing like...well, what you were thinking." You nodded. "I'm not entirely proud of this, but I suppose now, nobody can judge me. Tickling."

At this word, her pale skin went red and she unconsciously curled her toes. "...what?" She said in disbelief.

"Tickle torture. There's just...so much to like. It's truly a form of torture if used on the right person in the right way, and gives a true feeling of power and domination over the victim. It leaves no marks and can go on for very long." You smirked. "And you in particular, but also your sisters, will make lovely tickle slaves."

"W...w-well, I don't know about them," Daisy said loudly, hands firmly clasped at her sides. "But I'm...I'm not ticklish anywhere, so you're wasting your time." She nodded furiously.

You laughed. "Please. In case you haven't noticed, I'm psychic. I knew every single thing about you the moment I made eye contact with you. Every thought, every memory, everything." You enjoyed watching her squirm under your gaze. "Besides, no girl as beautiful as you could possibly not be ticklish." You closed your eyes. "Why...yes, countless memories of when you were nine, ten, eleven years old. Bossy elder sister, Violet and Lily often put you in your place. Violet would jump you and hold your ankles down, Lily would run her nails all over your soles until you said you were sorry. The younger sisters have to stick together, I see."

"I was...I was young-" Daisy mumbled.

"Are you still trying to convince me you're not ticklish?" You glared at Daisy. "Three months ago you took a guy home on a date. He tickled your foot during a foot massage and nearly caused you to pass out, then got you to spasm like a bronco with a rib and waist tickle when you tried to teach him how to dance. Stop wasting your time. You're as ticklish as a newborn baby."

With that, you snapped your fingers, and Daisy's arms were suddenly raised high above her head with her wrists locked together. Her legs went up, knees getting pressed against her chest, feet sticking straight out. Out of nowhere, a basket appeared underneath her bottom, and a collection of thin ropes began to wrap around her. They went around her wrists, your powers holding her arms far above her head. Her ankles resting on the rim of the basket, some ropes tied her feet down to that rim, and others went through her toes and pulled them back as well, so she couldn't even move her feet. She tried to squirm but could hardly move in her new position.

"Now...how shall I break you in?"
1141.title: A supervillian who has used his superpowers to ...

choices: Suspended in midair in a partial hogtie
In stocks with arms tied above head
Legs spread with arms tied above head
1142.content:
"Ms. Waterflower, how many times are we going to have this conversation?"

Daisy leaned back in the cushioned chair, a dismissive frown on her face, cell phone up to the left side of her head.

"I don't understand what the big deal is," Daisy replied, putting her right elbow on the armrest and resting her head on her hand. "When a trainer beats us, we give them the badge, and if they don't beat us we don't. That sounds like good documentation to me."

The man on the other end of the conversation sighed. "We've been through all this before, Ms. Waterflower. We need detailed data on the battle for our trainer statistics. Pokemon used, knockouts, battle progression, time, video recordings...this is not the 1960s, badges alone don't cut it anymore. And that's to say nothing of badge forgery. This is the fourth month in a row we haven't gotten your report, and without those reports we are entirely at the mercy of forged badges, plus our entire operation looks unprofessional without the complete set of data!"

A small, skinny man came up to Daisy and tapped her right knee. Slowly, Daisy pulled her right bare foot out of the hot, bubbling basin of water in front of her chair and placed it up on the cushioned bar in front of her. The man picked up a medium sized towel and started drying her foot and lower leg off.

"Well, like, we're very busy!" Daisy insisted. "I mean, gym leader is just part of what we do. We have all the shows, the modeling, the...the-"

"That's really not our problem," the man cut her off. "None of the other gym leaders have this problem. I've been working here for eight years and the Cerulean Gym is the only Gym in Kanto to ever submit so much as a single report late. You are now four reports behind, and I'm sure you remember our conversation about a majority of your previous reports not being up to standard."

The man at Daisy's feet started to scrape dead skin off the left side of her right big toe. Daisy sunk back into the chair slightly.

"Look. We know the rules of pokemon battles, we follow them, and if a trainer beats us they get the Cascade badge. I really feel like, in light of all of our other activities, many of which do contribute to the Pokemon League in terms of money and recognition, little problems with the reports-"

"Perhaps so," the man interrupted yet again. "But there's a big difference between reports with small problems and reports that don't even exist. You've told us a dozen times that you're almost done with the report from four months ago, and it's very important that we get that data before the tournament starts next month. We are not some mom-and-pop organization. Hundreds of millions of dollars go into the league, and any gaps in our data make us look bad."

Daisy grunted. "Well, like, it's really hard to go back and-" Daisy stopped to jerk her foot back as the man ran his small nail file against her sole, just below her big toe. "Hey, careful. I'm really ticklish," she whispered, smirking as she put her large foot back.

"Don't like it?" the man asked in a thickly accented voice.

"No, I hate it," she said, nevertheless smirking and sticking her tongue out at the man as he went back to work.

"What are you talking about?" The man on the phone said irately. "Hello?"

"Calm down, I'm still here," Daisy said. "It's hard to go back and find all the data from months ago, okay? You have to go all the way back in the video logs, watch the whole fight, take notes, snip the video clip out...it's a real pain."

"Then start making the reports right after the battles!" The other snapped. "Look, I'm getting the sense that you're not taking this very seriously. Being a Gym Leader is a responsibility and a privilege, and for your services as one the Pokemon League does pay you and your sisters millions of dollars a year. I know you don't want to lose that money or status."

"I'm not too worried about that," Daisy said casually, looking down at the nails of her right hand. The man tapped her right knee again, and she raised it up towards the ceiling so her foot was flat against the cushion. The man started to paint her toenails a bright red. "I've seen the polls, the Cerulean Sisters are the most popular gym leaders in Kanto and it's not close."

There was a long pause on the phone as the man started work on her toenails. "What exactly is that supposed to mean?"

"Well, you keep talking about money, and I'm sure you understand that you'd lose a lot of money if you suddenly got rid of your most popular gym leaders. I do read those pamplets you send out every month, you know. Fifty-eight percent of trainers polled say that we're their favorite gym, and sixty-five percent say we're the ones they'd like to see more of in promotional material regarding the league." Daisy switched the phone to the right side of her face. "I know you think I'm just some dumb blonde, but I know what our leverage is, and it's high."

Another long pause.

"So what are you implying?"

"You'll get the reports when you get them. Me and my sisters are all very busy, and most of our work is good for the league. And pestering me three times a week about it is not going to help get it done any faster." The man at her feet grabbed her lower leg gently and pulled it out so her sole was pointed outwards again. "Now, I'm in the middle of something, so I really need to go."

"Very well, Ms. Waterflower," the man replied coldly. "I'll report your responses to my superiors and we'll take whatever action we deem necessary."

"You do that," Daisy said, hanging up as the man picked up a flat stone with steam coming off it from the table next to him and pressed it against her bare sole. She sighed contentedly, sinking further into the chair and closing her eyes. "Anal-retentive pencilnecks," she said to herself. "Life's too short for reports."

-----

"Red," Lily deadpanned as Daisy kicked her white slippers off by the door. "How creative."

"Just because it doesn't look good on you," Daisy replied. "The geeks at the league called me again."

"Was it Warren again?" Violet asked. The two younger sisters of Daisy were seated on the couch in the middle of the room, Lily playing with her smartphone and Violet reading a magazine.

"Who else could it be?" Daisy said, raising her arms up into the air and bending her waist to her left, stretching.

"That's six times in ten days," Violet said. "I think you two are now officially dating."

"The tournament starts in a month," Daisy said, stretching to her right. "They want all our reports by then. We might want to get on that. Tomorrow?"

Lily shook her head. "I'm doing a photo shoot in the morning and I'm going on a late night show."

Violet looked up at the ceiling. "I've got a date."

Daisy shrugged. "A month is a long time, it won't be a big deal. Just whenever you can."

"I'm booked up for awhile," Lily said. "I'm starting dancing lessions three times a week."

Daisy smirked. "Dancing? Why?"

"Seems like it might be fun," Lily replied. "So I dunno, we'll see."

Violet cleared her throat. "I don't have much going on this weekend, maybe I'll punch some win-loss data into the system. After this weekend I'm starting horse-riding lessons so who knows?"

"That'll be great," Daisy said, giving her a double thumbs-up. "It should at least be enough to shut the pokemon league dweebs up." Daisy walked over to the fat chair to the left of the couch and plopped down into it heavily, propping her feet up on the ottoman.

-----

Daisy wakes up...
1142.title: An employee of the pokemon league told to punis...

choices: He starts tickling her feet
He decides to start somewhere else
11421.content:
Daisy's eyes fluttered open, and then immediately flew wide as she realized something was very wrong. She attempted to move her arms, then kick her legs, but neither moved more than a centimeter or two. As she got her wits, she was finally able to make some sense of her very strange predicament. She was in her bra and panties, like she was when she went to bed, but that's all that was familiar. She was in a very dark room, not able to make out very much around her, but more alarming was her position. Her arms were bound up above her head, slightly bent at the elbows, wrists and upper arms strapped tightly in place. Her legs were also strapped down to some sort of frame, legs slightly bent behind her so her entire body was arched back in a C shape, like a partial hogtie. Bindings at her ankles, just above and below her knees, and thighs prevented any real movement. To top it off, she was suspended in midair, hanging from the frame she was tied to, hips pointing down towards the ground. She tried to move again, but succeeded only in causing the frame to rotate slightly back and forth. Straps around her waist and chest completed her bondage, and she was certainly not going anywhere.

Panicking, she tried to scream, but the sound was muffled beyond any hope of being heard. A rubber ball gag was in her mouth, forcing her lips open and wedged between her front teeth, capped off with a rubber piece in her mouth that kept her tongue down. Panicking, she frantically starting thrashing, but again could only manage rocking back and forth so her stomach and thighs would become the point on her body closest to the ground.

Suddenly, the lights in the room flickered on, a series of powerful white lights emitting from the ceiling. She blinked a few times as her eyes watered.

"Now, now, Ms. Waterflower, don't waste your energy. You'll be needing it."

She tried to turn her head to the right, where she heard the voice, but found her head was locked into place, forced to stare forward. She tried to say something, but it was of course lost behind the gag.

"You have nothing to say that I want to hear, for the time being," the voice said. "You've done enough talking to my employers over the past several months. We know the things you have to say, you've said them more than we stand to hear."

Suddenly, a tall thin man wearing a black trenchcoat and black leather gloves walked into her view. Daisy felt a shiver run down her spine.

"The pokemon league is often buried in a sea of red tape and paperwork, but when you push the right buttons you can get things done very, very quickly." He spread is arms to his sides slowly. "Daisy Waterflower, you have pushed the right buttons. Not an hour after your latest phone call concluded were they calling me in and telling me what needed to happen. I must say, your challenge is a new one. The league hasn't encountered a problem like you before. So the solution needs to be equally creative."

Daisy broke out into a cold sweat and started shivering. She knew that the pokemon league was upset, and knew they were a nine figure organization...but she didn't think they would ever do something like this.

"We don't really want to seriously hurt you. You are, after all, a tremendous asset to the league. But we can not tolerate your recent behavior." He slowly walked off to the right of Daisy's vision before disappearing. She tensed up as soon as she couldn't see him anymore, terrified of what would come next. "Fortunately, you provided us with an ideal solution on the phone today without knowing it."

To her mild relief, he re-appeared, pushing a three foot tall cabinet on wheels across the tiled floor. The mystery contents of the cabinet quickly restored fear.

"Ms. Waterflower, on the phone today, I believe you mentioned that you 'hated tickling'."

At this line, Daisy's eyes widened further. The mystery man opened the top of the mystery cabinet and reached down into it.

"I've been sent here to put that claim to the test." His hands re-emerged holding a series of small tubes. "Unconventional, but ultimately a very strong solution. He began to slip the devices onto the ends of his fingers, revealing each ended in a little metal sphere at the tip. Daisy started screaming into her gag and shaking back and forth, trying her best to shake her head as well but ultimately failing. He shrugged. "Come now, it was either this or sticking you in a coffin filled with tarantulas. Yes, we actually discussed that one. Surely this is better."

As Daisy kept shaking back and forth though, she wasn't so sure about that. She had countless memories of being tickled during the first nineteen years of her life, none of them pleasant. Her sisters, parents and other relatives could draw violent shrieks from her with a simple finger stroking across her bare feet, or a pinch on her tummy, or a quick rib squeeze. Sometimes an uncle would pick her up and torment her stomach and ribs until she earned her freedom by squirming and kicking away, howling the whole time. And of course, the handful of times a group of people coordinated enough to have her held down, it was absolutely terrible. Cruel fingers poking and prodding every possible spot, causing her to scream like a banshee and laugh like a maniac.

She would have liked to believe she had outgrown her extreme childhood ticklishness, but that wasn't true either. She had a boyfriend not even six months ago who possessed devilishly roaming fingers that took every opportunity to exploit her most sensitive spots, and she still couldn't handle it. As the man finished securing the strange devices to his fingers and held them up in front of her, she redoubled her efforts to shake free and scream through her gag. Slowly, he walked out of her field of vision, causing her to tense up again. Her position wasn't helping her state of mind either. She was a pretty flexible girl and didn't have a problem with her arched position, it was nothing she wasn't trained to handle, but she was very much aware that every single sensitive spot on her body was completely open and entirely helpless.

"Do you really believe that the pokemon league, an organization that is rapidly approaching billion dollar a year status, would invest in anything but the very best bondage equipment?" The man asked from behind her. She felt a knot in her stomach. He was right behind her. "You couldn't escape from that frame in a decade. Speaking of which...let's see, the time is 11:43 PM...we'll plan for a 6:00 AM finish, sound good to you?"

At this, Daisy tried to give another gutteral screech and bucked even harder, rotating back and forth on the frame so much she nearly managed to get her face pointed down at the ground. The man grabbed the frame and forced it back into a position so her knees were pointed down at the floor and her feet would be pointing right up at him, then pulled a lever on the right side of it to lock it into place. She tried shaking again, but this time couldn't budge it so much as a centimeter. Dread filling her body, she was well aware that both her massive soles were pointed upwards and she would be completely unable to protect them in any way from this man. Whimpering, she finally stopped struggling and clenched her eyes shut.

Nothing happened for several seconds, each of those seconds increasing the fear that racked Daisy's body and making her feel more and more ticklish. She scrunched her toes up and tried flexing her feet upward, figuring that was the best defense she could offer.

Sweat ran down her body and dripped off at her knees, falling to the floor and pooling on the tile. Her stomach kept tying more and more knots the longer nothing happened.
11421.title: Suspended in midair in a partial hogtie

choices: He goes for her stomach
He goes for her thighs
114211.content:
Finally, she felt a cold point touch her heel and run down her wrinkled sole, flinching as much as she could before just barely managing to supress a giggle. Soon, a series of strokes were running down both of her soles in rapid succession, no doubt the tips of the finger attachments. She attempted to flex her feet the other way, flattening them out just to escape the strokes for a quarter-second, but this only opened up the entire sole for this man to play with. Then, she lost control over whether or not her feet were flexed, the sensations rocketing from her large soles up to her brain, stimulating them like never before. Laughter erupted from her throat and was stifled by the effective gag, and Daisy focused all her remaining energy in a futile attempt to thrust forward, away from the sadistic finger attachments.

She screamed and howled as ticklish sensations overtook her, neverending strokes from her torturer robbing her of all logical thought processes. No normal fingers could tickle half this effectively. It was like every single nerve ending in her feet were being individually isolated and tickled. In a brief moment of lucidity, she cursed herself for just getting a pedicure, thinking this might be five percent more tolerable without one.

"Freshly pedicured," the man purred, slowing down and synchronizing his strokes along both soles. "It doesn't get any better. Your feet are so big, so much surface area to stimulate, I really could spend six hours just doing this."

Suddenly, he started drawing tiny circles with two fingers right on the ball of her foot. Daisy screamed into the gag and wrenched her ankles against their restraints. That spot in particular drove her up the wall. She shook back and forth like she was being electrocuted, mad laughter getting stuck behind the gag. She was sure six hours of this would cause her to lose her mind and never get it back.

Suddenly, the tickle assault stopped. She panted through her nose, taking in as much oxygen as she could during the respite. She flinched as she felt him grab her left foot, but all he did was wrap something around her second toe. She felt her foot get flexed back, making her sole taut. She tried to flex it forward but found herself unable. She began to panic as she realized that he was tying her toes back so she couldn't scrunch her feet, meaning her sensitive soles would be completely exposed and open, with no hope of defensive wrinkles, and there would be nothing she could do about it.

Before she could spend too much time dreading this, her other foot was similarly flexed back before she could even think to resist. And then, as suddenly as it had stopped, the tickling resumed. She cackled like a madwoman into her gag and flinched forward as the leisurely strokes picked right back up.

Sweat kept pooling up beneath her as her body became drenched in her own fluids, every now and then joined by tears that rained down from the inside corners of her clenched eyes. Every single individual stroke of the finger tools was like a branding iron on her sole, for all the agony it caused her. Her wails were so muted by the gag that she was dimly able to make out what the man was saying as he worked.

"Over the years, the pokemon league has gone through extreme measures, at times, to maintain their sterling reputation in the world. When there's this much money involved, money always comes before morals. You may be the Queen of Kanto, Daisy Waterflower, but it's time for you to remember that the Queen is just a playing piece on our board." He started playfully scratching the pads of Daisy's toes with his finger tools, and she responded with a satisfactory yelp followed by the unmistakable sound of muted laughter. "No one is bigger than the league. Not even you."

She was more than ready to give in. Really, she was. She was ready to give in as soon as she was threatened with tickle torture. Now? She would have done anything to make it stop. Convincing her to finish her overdue reports would have been easy. As he snuck his fingers between her toes and toyed with the webs of flesh in there, which managed to pull out a fresh scream before she melted into little hiccups of laughter, she couldn't manage to think of something she wouldn't do just to make the tickling stop.

She couldn't even get enough air to laugh anymore. As her super-sensitive feet were tortured, all she could do is spasm back and forth with her head hanging, every now and then managing a barely audible giggle. He kept her in this state for a few minutes, then abruptly stopped.

She took in massive gasps of air through her nose, stomach hurting from laughing so much, lungs burning from being denied enough oxygen. She was dizzy. Without even really thinking about it, she released her bladder and peed through her panties, urine joining all the sweat on the floor.

"Don't tell me you're broken already," the man said. "Pee already? It's not even midnight yet."

Daisy was zoned out, just hanging there somewhere between consciousness and unconsciousness, not understanding what her torturer was saying. She couldn't even remember her name at that point in time, or what she had even done to get here. All she knew was that her world was a series of cruel, sadistic strokes on her bare feet that drove her ever closer to insanity.

She tensed up again when he grabbed her right foot, but he just let his thumb rub against the sole a little bit. The finger implements seemed to be off. "I'll definitely be back here before we're done." She would have shivered at the words, but she was still zoned out to the point where words meant nothing to her.

A few seconds later, she was suddenly doused in a shocking blast of cold water. She yelped and struggled instinctively before realizing that the cool feel of the water was actually rather nice, cooling her off from the tickle session that had left her burning up and soaked in sweat.

He walked around her slowly, holding up the hose and making sure to get everywhere. Once he was done, she felt like she could fall asleep and not wake up for a week. She was exhausted.

"You'd be wise to not fall asleep," he warned, setting the hose back down on the floor. "If it becomes a problem, I have ways of making sure you stay awake, and you won't particularly enjoy them."

She tried to slur some words out before remembering the gag. Slowly, she started to remember how words worked and what their connections were to each other. Suddenly, her eyes snapped open as she finally put two and two together and realized that, if it wasn't even midnight yet, then she had only been tickled for about fifteen minutes and faced another six hours of this hell! Unable to vocalize her duress, she started futilely struggling against her bonds again, shaking the frame back and forth ineffectively.

"Well, that was a good warmup," the man said as he went back over to his cabinet and deposited his finger implements. "But it's now officially midnight, so I think it's time to really get started." He glanced at her. "Knock that off, you're not going anywhere. Those straps will saw through your skin well before the opposite."

Daisy was in no mood to accept her ticklish fate, even if part of her knew full well she wasn't going to escape the frame. At least she could say she fought this way, she figured. As the mystery torturer pulled out a pair of foreign devices that resembled miniature power drills, she began to consider the option of letting the straps cut through her skin if it might mean escape.

The man held the two devices up, allowing Daisy to see that, unlike actual power drills, they ended with three plastic tips in a triangle formation in place of the drill bit. He flipped a switch on either of the handles and the two devices buzzed to life, the tips vibrating to create a blur effect.

Daisy was willing to bet anything the implements were designed to extract more ticklish agony from her sensitive skin, and would have given anything to avoid them. He approached her, and all she could do was scream into her gag and plead with her eyes.
114211.title: He starts tickling her feet

choices: The man ignores Daisy's begging and begins tickling her armpits
Daisy makes an offer that the man accepts to stop tickling her
1142111.content:
He unlocked the rotating rack and pushed it up slightly so he was directly facing her sexy toned stomach, abs showing through the skin thanks to her arched position. It was obvious where he was going now.

She sucked in her tummy the best she could as the vibrating tips approached, as if they were red hot coals. She almost wished they were. Soon, there was nowhere for her to go, and all she could do is whimper.

The tips pressed into her stomach and she immediately screeched and bucked what little she could, but her movements only served to press her tummy further into the tips and just make it worse. The tips may as well have been power drills, plowing holes through her abdomen, it would have made little difference to her. She twitched back and forth, stomach muscles rippling underneath her skin as she did all she could to pull away from the tools. She laughed like a madwoman underneath the gag as he started slowly moving the half-dozen tips around her exposed belly.

"MMMMMMMPPPPHHHHHHHH!" she hollered, eyes flying open as the devices slowly went down her abs towards her hips. She had never cared to make a map of where she was most ticklish, she'd rather avoid the nasty business altogether, but it seemed like her lower stomach region was as ticklish as they came. He approached her panty line, but slowly looped back upward before getting there, to her mild relief.

"Oh don't worry," he said slowly, working the tips over every little bump and contour on her shaped abdomen. Her cackling was muted enough to barely make his words out. "I've been told to avoid certain...private regions on your body. My employers at the league did extend you at least that courtesy."

As he pressed the tips into her sides, causing her to scream before resuming laughter, she was able to get outraged for about half a second over the thought that anything about this torture was courteous. But she quickly forgot about that as he started going up and down on her super sensitive sides.

"I've seen what these things can do...down there," he said, glancing downward as he said this. "Those who actually managed to maintain their sanity afterward said it was an incredibly pleasurable experience, but the league specified that there could be no risk of permanent damage to you."

"SSSMMMMMPPPPHHHHHH!" Permanent damage?! As the man started using both tools on the right side of her stomach, making her pull towards the left with all her might, she felt like there had already been quite a bit of permanent damage caused to her, physically and psychologically.

He kept on drilling those tips into her stomach area, all the way up to just below her large breasts and just above her panty line, all the way across to her side, drawing unpredictable ticklish patterns on her torso. He enjoyed watching her muscles tense and spasm as he tickled and tickled. Eventually she ran out of air to laugh and just hung there, giving little hiccups of giggles from time to time. Eventually, she released her bladder again, soaking her panties for a second time. As drool started to ooze out of the sides of her gag, he finally decided she had suffered enough for the time being and turned the tools off.

He walked back over to his evil cabinet, leaving her to take in large heaves of air, now hanging limply from the rack instead of tensed up against it. Her stomach ached from laughing so much as her vision swam in front of her. She fought to remain awake, as every fiber of her being longed for the embrace of unconsciousness.

A blast of cold water helped wake her up, as the man hit her with another long blast from the hose, sending streams of sweat down to the tiles below, down through the drains, and cooling her off nicely.

After a minute of this, he dropped the hose and walked up to her. She recoiled the best she could, but he went up to her face and grabbed the ball gag up to her lips.

"I think that's enough of this," he said, pulling the rubber bit out of her mouth and pulling the band up over her head. It was a very liberating feeling, and she gratefully sucked down lungfuls of air with newfound freedom. She closed her eyes and panted, mind finally settling back into place and allowing her to think straight.

When she opened her eyes, the man was holding a sports bottle with a large straw on top in front of her. It occured to her that her throat was parched, and she quickly wrapped her lips around the straw and sucked down a stream of cold water. She did this for several seconds before he pulled it away from her, before she could make herself sick.

"Well, Ms. Waterflower. By all accounts you're a woman in good shape, so I think we're ready to start again." He clapped his hands together and walked over towards the cabinet again.

"No...nononono....Ican't....Ican't-" Daisy babbled, still not completely coherent. "Nomorenomore...nomore."

"I gave you a nearly ninety minute break, Ms. Waterflower," the man insisted, opening one of the side doors on the cabinet. "Surely you can handle another session now!"

Daisy blinked dimly a few times. Ninety minutes? That felt more like five. Somewhere in there, she must have lost track of time or dozed off, but she sure didn't feel rested. She could barely get out coherent words.

"It's almost two, if we don't start now we'll never get through everything on my schedule by six. That's what you want, isn't it? Surely that break has re-energized you."

"P-please, sir, I'm sorry," Daisy choked out, trying extra hard to be coherent. She put extra effort into her speech, trying to get her words out as coherently as possible. "I'll finish the reports, I swear I'll finish them...it'll never ever happen again, I swear, just lemme go."

He pulled his hands out from the cabinet, this time carrying no tools, and briskly walked back over to her. She tensed up as he reached forward and grabbed her thighs with his bare hands. He started to squeeze, digging the nails of his fingers into the inside of her thighs. She convulsed and started cackling again, this time no gag present to mute her.

"Oh, that's bad luck Ms. Waterflower...looks like you've got ticklish thighs. I can't possibly leave here today without spending some time down here."

"BaHaHAHA STAAAAAHAHAP!" she hollered, shaking back and forth on the rack. She had never been tickled on her thighs before, and found his fingers pulsing on the flesh on her inside thighs to be unbearable, and a little too close to certain areas for comfort. "PPPAHAHAHAHAAAA PLLLHAHAHAHA!"

His hands suddenly dropped down and found her knees, grabbing both kneecaps and squeezing repeatedly. She yelped in shock before dissolving into spasmodic laughs.

"And such ticklish knees! I wouldn't be fulfilling my contract if you left without having these get mercilessly tickled." He kept on pulsing his fingers on those ticklish caps, and she wondered what horrible things she had done in a previous life to deserve such a sensitive body.

His hands flew up to the hollows underneath her arms, nails stroking that sensitive pit back and forth, which was no less agonizing for poor Daisy. She shrieked and struggled in her bonds, her armpits stretched and completely defenseless.

"SttaAAAAAAAAHAHAP! STAAAAHHAP!" she demanded. "NOHAHAANO!"

"And who could forget these precious hollows? No, Ms. Waterflower, I don't see any way I could possibly let you go early." With that, he stopped his assault and went back over to the cabinet, leaving Daisy to pant and babble as he reached down into the cabinet. "Don't worry, it'll be over before you know it."

"I'll pay!" she gasped, wheezing like a broken squeak toy. "I have...money...lotta money!"

"I make a lot of money, Ms. Waterflower," the man replied. "And I know exactly how much you have in your accounts and your net worth, assets and all, and there's no offer you can make me worth me risking my job."

"Nonono...nono...I'll do anything!" she insisted, shaking her head in denial.

"Ms. Waterflower, you've been bad and you know it, now take your punishment like an adult," he said, standing up and holding up two large, stiff artist brushes.

"NOOOnono...nomore..." she begged, tensing up and repressing giggles just from looking at the brushes. "I'll..I'll-"

1313.content:
It was a bright and sunny morning; a perfectly beautiful start to the day, and a perfect day to finally confess your love to a certain beautiful girl. Ever since you had first witnessed the sensational sisters' dazzling performances, you had fallen head over heels in love with them. You adored everything about them: Daisy's relaxed and gentle presence, Violet's cool beauty, and the youngest sister Misty who was practically born to be a mermaid. Misty rarely took part in their shows, having her duties as the Cerulean City gym leader to take priority over performing with her sisters, but she was always a fan favorite with her incredible finesse in the water.

However, your personal favorite was someone else. You never really cared for Misty as much as the other fans did, and your eyes always remained locked on a different sister. Lily, the adorable pink-haired goddess of the water that she was, was the one you had become the most infatuated with. She always looked so happy as she performed, wearing a cheerful smile on her face like a child who had just received a brand new toy, and her playful attitude lured you in like a fish to the hook. She just seemed like the kind of person who could find a way to have fun in any situation, and you simply couldn't help but adore her.

For many weeks you have been keeping your feelings for her a secret, but today was the day that you had decided to tell Lily how you truly felt about her. With any luck, she might just end up returning your feelings. Heading over to the Cerulean gym, you enter the door while hiding a bouquet of flowers behind your back. You walk around for a bit, and soon a cheerful voice draws your attention.

"Hey dude, what's up? Do you, like, need anything?"

Looking in the direction of the voice, you find yourself staring eye to eye with the smiling face of Lily herself! You immediately begin to blush as you gaze upon her perfect figure. She was wearing a casual (yet still very attractive) outfit; a green T-shirt, an indigo skirt, and a pair of orange flipflops on her dainty little feet. The footwear revealed her slender toes to your view, and each of her nails was painted with a layer of pink nail polish. As you stared at her in awe of her youthful beauty, Lily waved her hand in front of your face to snap you out of your trance.

"He~llo! Anyone in there?" she asked in a cute sing-songy voice.

"Oh, um, sorry! I... Lily, I'm a huge fan of you and your sisters... I really love your performances." you stutter out nervously.

"Oh yeah? Well thanks, dude! It's always nice to get praise from the fans!" she said with a smile.

Lily then winked at you and blew you a kiss. You thought you were about to faint, but you instead swung the bouquet out and presented it to her.

"Here! I... I got this for you, Lily!"

"Awww, that's so sweet! Thanks a bunch, dude!" Lily says, gracefully accepting your gift.

"Y-yeah, you're welcome... Um, Lily, I know this is kinda sudden and all... But there is one more thing that I wanted to tell you..."

"Really? And, like, what might that be?"

"Y-you see, ever since I first saw you perform... I've been crazy in love with you, Lily! Would you please consider going out on a date with me?"

Lily's face turned to one of shock for a moment, before she soon began blushing as well. She was used to hearing fans ask out Daisy and Violet, but being the youngest of the trio, she herself rarely experienced this sort of situation. While she was still very confident in her own good looks, she still knew that she couldn't possibly compare to her older sisters. In fact, the only times she had been asked out so far were when a guy had already been shot down by Violet or Daisy. They would then try to get her instead, thinking because of her innocent appearance that they could win her over easily, and naturally she had refused all of them so far. Yet this time, a guy was asking her out directly. She didn't really know how to react to a situation like this, so she nervously mutters out...
1313.title: Confessing to Lily

1321.content:
Night fellas you slowly made your way to the Cerulean Gym. Anxiety mixed with eagerness filled your body as you crept along. This would be your first big mission,and boy was it big! To rob Gym Leaders, especiLly the Cerulean Sisters, was a big deal! You picked the lock and headed for the tanks.

As you wandered through, your stomach began to twist into knots. There wasn't a single Pokemon anywhere in the Gym! At this rate, you'd be the laughing stock of Team Rocket! As if in response to your panic, you heard a splash nearby.

As you hurried to investigate, you found it wasn't a Pokemon, but a human. Lily Waterflower to be exact. She had just finished up practicing a routine, and was drying herself off with a towel.

"Stupid Daisy and Violet!" she complained out loud to herself, "Taking away all the Pokemon for themselves." your stomach churned at that, "Lucky for me I swiped the rarest one to keep! No one'll know where it is but me,"

Suddenly, a light seemed to be descending from above, your reputation could be saved! All you had to do was get the whereabouts of that Pokemon. Then something happened that made you forget about the Pokemon. Lily pointed her adorable feet in the air. Upon seeing them, you realized you wanted something more than Rocket cred, you wanted some time alone with this feet! But how to get it......
1321.title: A Rocket Grunt hunting for rare water Pokemon.

choices: Wait for her to wake up.
What the heck. Have fun now!
13213.content:
You smacked your forehead. Duh! Pokemon! You reached for one of the three Pokeballs on your belt. With you was a Zubat, a Houndor, and your first ever Pokemon, your loyal Galvantula. Utilizing strategies you had trained to perfection, you released all three.

Houndor darted up first. The moment Lily noticed him, he caught her in a Mean Look.

"W-What the heck?" she asked, stepping back as Zubat swooped in and nailed her with Confuse Ray, "Ugh.....I don't feel so...." was all she could say before Galvantula did her part. She quickly fired a String Shot, wrapping up the Gym Leader. You thanked your Pokemon, returned them, and grinned deviously. Lily was all yours now.

info.brief_description: A Foot Fetish and Tickling Story featuring the three Sensational Sisters of Pokemon.
info.description:
So today I was thinking, there's a lot of good foot fetish material on writing.com, a lot of it featuring popular anime characters. But three characters, admittedly minor ones, seem to have gotten no or next to no attention at all, which struck me as odd and unfortunate given that they are three characters who are renowned for their beauty in-universe. Yes, I am talking about the Sensational Sisters, or the Waterflower sisters, co-gym leaders of Cerulean City. Daisy, Violet, and Lily Waterflower. Three beautiful young women who seem like obvious targets for foot fetish stories, yet there's nothing out there for them. So, this story will be dedicated, entirely, to those three and their feet, as well as tickling of their bodies.

A couple of quick notes:

1:
Daisy Waterflower - Blonde Waist-Length Hair, Oldest, Most Grounded
Violet Waterflower - Blue Lower-Back-Length Hair, Arguably Most Intelligent
Lily Waterflower - Red/Pink Shoulder-Length Hair, Youngest, Most Immature

2:
Misty Waterflower is not being included as one of the primary characters (though she may be included in a side role) since there is more than a metric ton of foot fetish stories involving her on this site already.

3:
Anyone is free to add chapters, but I will ask and expect that everyone takes it seriously and at least attempts to maintain a good level of quality writing.

4:
I will try to create as many scenarios as possible so there's a wide variety of different things that can be done with this story. Please try to maintain this level of variety by coming up with different ways to tell the story.
